SCTX:
begin sprigganeffect

;part of spriggan script, places the effect and plays sound 
;when spriggan comes back to life
;also used for werewolves in wilderness


float timepassed

If (MenuMode==1)
	Return
endif

if (timepassed=0)
	LoopGroup Idle2 1
endif

Set timepassed to (timepassed + GetSecondsPassed)

If (timepassed<2)
	return
elseif (timepassed >4)
	setdelete 1
elseif (timepassed >=2)
	disable
endif

end sprigganeffect
